categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text:
This individual was a Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire apprentice of the Dread Masters in 3668 BBY, during the Great Galactic War. When his masters, just captured by the Galactic Republic and Jedi Order, were transferred to the Section X of the The Tomb on Belsavis, they managed to send a telepathic message to their apprentice.
The apprentice hijacked the Fatality, a starship full of prototype HK-51 droids, and arrived over the planet in an attempt to free his masters. However, the ship was easily shot down by the prison's orbital defenses, and the ship landed on a frozen lake, killing the crew and putting the droids in stasis.
